statements: SELECT * FROM medication_sales;
SELECT medication_name, quantity_sold FROM medication_sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM medication_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT * FROM medication_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity_sold FROM medication_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM medication_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM medication_sales GROUP BY medication_name
SELECT * FROM medication_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM medication_sales
SELECT medication_name, quantity_sold * 10 AS total_price FROM medication_sales WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%'
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, price FROM medications ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE manufacturer='Johnson & Johnson';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, price FROM medications WHERE price < 50;
SELECT sale_date, sales_amount, quantity FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' ORDER BY medication_name DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage, price FROM medications WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT medication_name, dosage, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medications JOIN sales ON medications.id = sales.medication_id GROUP BY medication_name, dosage
SELECT manufacturer, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM medications GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING AVG(price) > 75
SELECT sale_date, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM sales GROUP BY sale_date ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, price FROM medications;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM medications ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT medication_id, demand, forecast_date FROM forecasts ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM medications WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT m.name, s.quantity, f.demand FROM medications m JOIN sales s ON m.id = s.medication_id JOIN forecasts f ON m.id = f.medication_id WHERE f.forecast_date = '2022-08-15' AND s.quantity > 100;
SELECT m.name, AVG(s.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM medications m JOIN sales s ON m.id = s.medication_id GROUP BY m.name HAVING avg_quantity > 50 ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;
SELECT m.name, COUNT(s.id) AS total_sales FROM medications m LEFT JOIN sales s ON m.id = s.medication_id GROUP BY m.name HAVING total_sales < 10 ORDER BY total_sales ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, price FROM medications ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) FROM medications GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, price FROM medications ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sales JOIN medications ON sales.medication_id = medications.medication_id WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, sum(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales JOIN medications ON sales.medication_id = medications.medication_id GROUP BY medication_name;

SELECT prescriptions.prescription_id, prescriptions.prescription_date, medications.medication_name FROM prescriptions JOIN medications ON prescriptions.medication_id = medications.medication_id WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, category FROM medications ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT medication_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT manufacturer_id, name, location FROM manufacturers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone FROM customers ORDER BY name;
SELECT name, price FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE category = 'Painkillers'
SELECT m.name, s.quantity, s.sale_date FROM medications m JOIN sales s ON m.id = s.medication_id WHERE s.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY s.sale_date
SELECT c.name, c.email, f.forecast_quantity FROM customers c JOIN forecasts f ON c.customer_id = f.forecast_id ORDER BY f.forecast_date DESC
SELECT m.name AS medication, s.quantity * s.price AS total_sales FROM medications m JOIN sales s ON m.id = s.medication_id WHERE s.quantity * s.price > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
